titleStmt.title: A new song, called Jacke Doues resolution by which he doth show, that he cares not a rush how ere the world goe. To the tune of, To driue the cold winter away.
Jacke Doves resolution
titleStmt.author: G. B., fl. 1592-1597.

publicationStmt.publisher: for Iohn Wright and are to be sold at his shop in Giltspur-street at the signe of the Bible,

notesStmt.note: In two parts; woodcuts at head of each part.
Verse - "To all my good friends, these presents I send,".
Reproductions of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Giltspur-street at the signe of the Bible
